data.title: Leicester weather and climate in 2024
data.text:
Weather overview

Leicester (United Kingdom) is a place with a mild climate. Temperatures during the day are in the range from 7Â Â°CÂ (45Â Â°F) in January to 22Â Â°CÂ (71Â Â°F) in July. Temperatures during the night go from 1Â Â°CÂ (35Â Â°F) in February to 12Â Â°CÂ (54Â Â°F) in July. The driest month is September with just 10Â days of rain, on the contrary, the month when it rains the most is January with 13Â days of rain.

January weather

The number of rainy days is on its maximum, the value of this measure is 13Â days in Leicester. The wind speed is on its maximum in January. The minimum of the day temperature can be noticed in January.

February weather

The number of rainy days starts to descent, with its value being 11Â days in Leicester, while the rainfall amount reaches its minimum, its value is 42Â mmÂ (1.65Â in). The minimum of the night temperature is observable, with its value being 1Â Â°CÂ (35Â Â°F). The beginning of the rise of the number of sun hours (without clouds) could be noticed in February.

March weather

The day temperature starts to rise, with its value being 10Â Â°CÂ (50Â Â°F) in Leicester, and the beginning of the rise of the night temperature could be noticed too, the value of this measure is 3Â Â°CÂ (38Â Â°F). The number of rainy days starts to rise. The number of sun hours (without clouds) continues to rise, with its value of 3Â hours.

April weather

The day temperature continues to rise, its value is 13Â Â°CÂ (55Â Â°F) in Leicester, and the rise of the night temperature can be observed as well, with its value of 5Â Â°CÂ (40Â Â°F). The number of rainy days descent's start could be observed, the value of this measure is 11Â days. The number of sun hours (without clouds) continues to rise, with its value being 4Â hours.

May weather

The day temperature rises similarly to the previous month, with its value of 16Â Â°CÂ (61Â Â°F) in Leicester, and the night temperature continues to rise too, with its value being 7Â Â°CÂ (45Â Â°F). The rise of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, with its value of 5Â hours.

June weather

The tourist season is about to start in Leicester. The day temperature rises similarly to the previous month, with its value being 19Â Â°CÂ (67Â Â°F), and the rise of the night temperature can be observed as well. The beginning of the rise of the rainfall amount could be noticed. The maximum of the number of sun hours (without clouds) is observable, its value is 6Â hours. The minimum of the wind speed can be noticed, with its value being 4.

July weather

The day temperature reaches its maximum, the value of this measure is 22Â Â°CÂ (71Â Â°F) in Leicester, and the maximum of the night temperature can be noticed too, with its value of 12Â Â°CÂ (54Â Â°F). The tourist season continues. The number of sun hours (without clouds) starts to descent, its value is 6Â hours. The humidity is on its minimum, the value of this measure is 79Â %.

August weather

The tourist season is close to its peak this month in Leicester. The beginning of the rise of the number of rainy days could be noticed, with its value being 11Â days.

September weather

The tourist season continues in Leicester. The number of rainy days reaches its minimum, its value is 10Â days. The night temperature starts to descent, with its value of 10Â Â°CÂ (50Â Â°F), and the day temperature descent's start could be observed as well, with its value being 19Â Â°CÂ (65Â Â°F). The number of sun hours (without clouds) descent's start could be observed, the value of this measure is 4Â hours.

October weather

The day temperature descents similarly to the previous month, with its value being 14Â Â°CÂ (58Â Â°F) in Leicester, and the descent of the night temperature can be observed as well, its value is 7Â Â°CÂ (45Â Â°F). The beginning of the rise of the number of rainy days could be noticed, with its value of 12Â days, while the rainfall amount is on its maximum in October. The number of sun hours (without clouds) descents similarly to the previous month, its value is 3Â hours.

November weather

The day temperature continues to descent, with its value being 10Â Â°CÂ (50Â Â°F) in Leicester, and the night temperature continues to descent as well, its value is 4Â Â°CÂ (40Â Â°F). The descent of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, with its value being 2Â hours.

December weather

The night temperature descents similarly to the previous month, with its value of 2Â Â°CÂ (35Â Â°F) in Leicester, and the day temperature descents similarly to the previous month as well, its value is 7Â Â°CÂ (45Â Â°F). The number of sun hours (without clouds) reaches its minimum, its value is 1Â hour. The minimum of the day length can be noticed, the value of this measure is 7Â hours. The humidity is on its maximum, the value of this measure is 92Â %.
